Coming Soon Pro

Video Preview Coming Soon Demo Maintenance Mode Demo

Features

Simple & Flexible

The Coming Soon Pro plugin works with any WordPress Theme and is visible only to non logged in user.This allows you to work on your site while visitors see your coming soon page. Also included is a maintenance mode which allows you to gracefully take your site offline after launch.

Easily Capture Leads

The Coming Soon plugin allows you to capture email leads while you build your site. Tight integration with MailChimp, Constant Contact, Aweber, Campaign Moniter & Gravity Forms makes this task super easy. Check out the documenation button above to see how.

Powerful Features

You spoke and we listened. The Coming Soon Pro Plugin includes features such as Google Font integration, customizable CSS3, White Label Branding, Mobile Ready, Social Media integration, and more. Plus we are constanly developing the plugin based off your feedback.

Questions

What type of payments do you accepts?

We currently accept PayPal and Goolge Checkout. We also accept Visa, Master Card, American Express & Discover via PayPal, no account required.

What happens after my support and updates end?

The plugin will continue to function normally after your initial 1 year of support and updates. You just won't be entitiled to updates and support. If you'd like to renew, you'll be able to at 50% off the developers license and 25% off the single site license.

Do you offer refunds?

Refunds are issued if there is an issue or conflict that support can not fix and it's within 30 day from the purchase date. See our Refund Policy.

What do I do if I have a problem?

If you need support please visit our support site and see if an answer to question already exist. If it does not then oipen a ticket and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
